intro: Psychotria corymbosa, commonly known as the "Whispering Angel" or "Cup of Joe," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of the Americas, including parts of Central and South America. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and clusters of small, white flowers that bloom throughout the year. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. Psychotria corymbosa is also notable for its use in traditional medicine and its role in the ecological interactions of its habitat.
